page.title: 10Children- Clubs,Gotherington
page.content: Village activities for children include Brownies,Cub Scouts,Girl Guides,Boys Club,Sunday School, Playschool,Tennis Club,Horse Riding and Dance classes.People from the village or other villages organise most of the activites.One Playschool is held at the Village Hall and another at a private house.The Tennis Club use the two tennis courts in Gotherington.There are two groups on Saturday morning,one at 10.00a.m.and one at 11.00a.m.They have a coach to help them learn how to play properly. Girl Guides,Brownies and Cub Scouts are held at the Village Hall.At Brownies they do similar things to Guides i.e.rounders,tracking and gaining badges,they also play games insid
